amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit $250,000 from being used for the construction of the Triangle Building by Alianza Dominicana, Inc., in New York, New York.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 111-219 to prohibit $250,000 from being used for the construction of the Triangle Building by Alianza Dominicana, Inc., in New York, New York, and reduce the amount of the appropriate section of the bill by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 124 - 310 (Roll no. 629).
